meanings.definition: A member of a group of organic compounds containing a hydroxyl group attached to a carbon atom next to the carbon atom bearing a carboxyl group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the alphyl in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Organic chemistry involves understanding alphyl compounds.
meanings.sent3: The alphyl molecule walked into a bar and asked for a drink.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was like an alphyl, always attached to her heart.
meanings.sent5: The alphyl compound stood out in the sea of organic molecules.

meanings.definition: A compound derived from an alkyl group by replacing a hydrogen atom with a hydroxyl group.
meanings.sent1: The alphyl in the reaction mixture was crucial for the synthesis.
meanings.sent2: The chemist identified the alphyl as a key component.
meanings.sent3: Why did the alkyl group invite the alphyl to the party? For a hydroxyl of a good time!
meanings.sent4: In the world of molecules, the alphyl was a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The alphyl compound transformed the entire experiment with its presence.
